title: Authenticating forever
body:
launch league

enter passowrd

connect butten

"authenticating" for like 2 min

"an unexpected error occurred while loggin in blah blah blah"

NO I AM NOT HAVING INTERNET PROBLEMS

YES LEAGUE HAS AN EXCEPTION ON MY FIREWALL TO FIX OLD IISSUES

my friends say im appearing online whenever is says "authenticating" then offline when i close it out. 

help{{item:3073}}

replies.body:
see some of the top threads. 
chicagoland area (midwest at least)? ISP = comcast? 
if so, culprit found.

Yeeeaaaaa as it turns out Comcast seems to be having some issues around the Illinois/Indiana areas. Some players have been getting stuck in this authentication loop due to how they're routing your connection. Luckily enough, most of those I've been in contact with have been able to get back in the game by using a temporary VPN workaround, and the one I've been suggesting is CyberGhost. Let me know if that's able to help you as well!

Same here.

It seems that it is a PC related problem. I have 4 PCs in this network. 3 of them can log in regularly without any problems. Just one is having this issue constantly.
yes i live in Illinois and my brothers isint working either
butt my friends, who live right near me same isp are currently playing.
